item.title: Pelican Case workstation
item.description: This is a 15kg pelican case that houses lab bench power supply, ethernet switch, second screen, charger for my laptop and much more. Also It’s incredible durable thanks to using a gun hard case.

item.title: RC car mode
item.description: A mod for RC. Completely new remote based on LoRa, new and stronger battery, better H-Bridge. All of those improvements make it more pleasurable to drive. And don’t worry, with a little persistence It should be possible to mod any RC like that.
